We want to put the largest digit in the highest place value. 

Which digit is the largest?

$\greenD7$ is the largest digit, and we want to put it in the position with the highest place value.   

  So $\greenD7$ will be in the hundreds place: 
 $\greenD{7}$ $\_$ $\_$

Now we need to do the same thing with the next largest digit:  $\blueD5$.  

  So  $\blueD5$ goes in the tens place:  

$\greenD{7}\blueD5 \_$

The smallest digit is the $\purpleC3$.  The  $\purpleC3$ goes in the ones place:  

$\greenD{7}\blueD5\purpleC3$

The greatest possible number we can make is $\greenD{7}\blueD5\purpleC3$.
